titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4506) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1995, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-540, by Mr. Hall (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4506. All points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 or 6 of rule XXI are waived. Measure will be read by paragraph. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 172.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/9/1994--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 4506 (FY 1995 appropriations for energy and water development).
